document.title: WEL_RADIO_BUTTON
document.paragraph:
A ../../reference/wel_radio_button_chart.xmlWEL_RADIO_BUTTON control can take two states, checked or unchecked. By placing more than one of these in a ../../reference/wel_group_box_chart.xmlWEL_GROUP_BOX, they will become grouped, and only one may be checked at once.
